note.p: Irish physician. Resident medical officer, Dr Steevens’s Hospital, Dublin. Physician, Fever Hospital, Kilmainham. Lecturer on clinical medicine, and later, professor of physic, Dr Steevens’s Hospital Medical College.

p.hi: Catalogue of graduates, University of Dublin

note.p: Ireland, civil registration deaths index, 1864–1958 (Ancestry.com, accessed 30 March 2017)
Ireland, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1922 (www.willcalendars.nationalarchives.ie, accessed 30 March 2017)
